task.title: Building the documentation
task.shortdesc: The raw .dita files are not very user-friendly. They can, to get consumed by readers, be transformed to other, easier to read, file formats. Among these target formats can be .pdf, .html (Websites), .md (Markdown) and more.

step.cmd: Run npm run build in the Command line inside the documentation directory
step.info: This runs dita-ot-helper build-configs/*.json, which in turn processes all the build configs in that directory.

taskbody.result: The build config files in the build-configs directory get processed. The generated outputs gets written to the location specified in the configs.
